Summary: I was working as a night gaurd.When myself and a co worker observed a ball of light moving frequently around a ski mountain and forest above and below tree level for three weeks
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Shelby Township
There were no other sightings in Shelby Township on or around August 26th 2004
divs: Sighting DetailsI was working as a night gaurd and notice a bright light just above the tree line of a forest boardering the parking lot the light stayed for three maybe four weeks hovering above below and infront of the forest some times as high enogh to above the ski hill behind the forest sometime lower than the trees my coworker decided we should get closer we got as close to the forest as possible then he spotlighted it then it flew rite over to us in les than a second it was rite infront of us hovering it sat there still noise less for a short time maybe 3 mins then turned bega to fly away so fast it was out of veiw in a second and sorry for the bad selling lack of gramaher its hard to tye so much on a hone
